properties.title: FreeHEP Java Library - Java 3D Lego Plot Demo

section.name: FreeHEP Java 3D Lego Plot Demo
section.p: The FreeHEP Java3D Lego Plot Demo was written as a test application for the Java3D Plotting Package. This package includes three plotting classes: a 2D Lego Plot, a Surface Plot, and a 3D Scatter Plot. The 3D Lego plotting class also generates a wire plot in which each box is replaced by a vertical line for animation of the plot on slower systems.
The 3D Lego Demo is available for download using Java Web Start. You must have Java Web Start 1.0 AND the Java 3D extensions already installed on your machine for the download to work.
Feel free to send comments/suggestions/bug reports to the author, Joy Kyriakopulos.
